verse: So this is what the Lord of heaven’s armies says:

What man is wise enough to understand these things? Is there someone who has been taught by the Lord who can explain them? Why was the land ruined? Why has it been made like an empty desert where no one goes?
The Lord answered, “It is because Judah quit following my teachings that I gave them. They have not obeyed me. They have not done what I told them to do.
Instead, the people of Judah were stubborn. They followed the false god Baal. Their fathers taught them to do this!”
So this is what the Lord of heaven’s armies, God of Israel, says: “I will soon make the people of Judah eat bitter food. I will make them drink poisoned water.

I will scatter them through other nations. They will live in strange nations that they and their ancestors never knew about. I will chase the people of Judah with the sword until they are all killed.”
This is what the Lord of heaven’s armies says:
Say, “This is what the Lord says:
This is what the Lord says:
The Lord says, “The time is coming when I will punish all those who are circumcised only in the flesh.

That is the people of Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon and Moab. I will also punish the desert people who cut their hair short. The men in all those countries have not given themselves to serving me. And the men of Israel do not give themselves to serving me.”
